texto: 6.4.9.2 Outcomes As a result of the successful implementation of the Verification process: a) Constraints of verification that influence the requirements, architecture, or design are identified. b) Any enabling systems or services needed for verification are available. c) The system or system element is verified. d) Data providing information for corrective actions is reported. e) Objective evidence that the realized system fulfills the requirements, architecture and design is provided. 82 © ISO/IEC 2017 – All rights reserved © IEEE 2017 – All rights reserved Authorized licensed use limited to: Burapha University provided by UniNet.
